projects.title: PlatoAI
projects.description: AI-powered college essay guidance platform with secure OAuth sign-in, revision history, and rubric-aware feedback scoring, serving over 3.5k students.

projects.title: RealTalk
projects.description: An AI-powered resume and interview analysis platform that helps applicants refine their resumes and practice interview skills, while also helping recruiters find / filter for candidates that actually meet their requirements.

projects.title: Rust Compiler
projects.description: A from-scratch compiler project in Rust that parses, type-checks, and lowers a small language into executable code.

projects.title: RL Framework for Gaming Agents
projects.description: A reinforcement learning framework for training, comparing, and evaluating gaming agents across environments and algorithms.

projects.title: AI Parlay Builder
projects.description: A system that models leg win probabilities, computes implied odds and expected value for candidate parlays, and ranks bets by risk-adjusted EV.

projects.title: Thesys AI
projects.description: A context-aware research agent that reads sources, tracks citations, and generates structured notes tailored to a user's questions.

projects.title: Gradus App
projects.description: Collaborative grade-tracking app that scrapes and aggregates Katy ISD reports with headless Puppeteer jobs and delivers real-time insights via Flutter.

projects.title: RevOS
projects.description: A data-driven web app that helps students manage finances, upcoming assignments, syllabi, and set priorities for the upcoming week. Submitted to HowdyHack 2025.

projects.title: Poker Solver
projects.description: A tool for analyzing poker spots and strategies using game-theoretic concepts and simulation to suggest better lines.

projects.title: Finance Manager Tool
projects.description: A personal dashboard that tracks cash flow with simple analytics.
